nodes.text: Electrocrops were a type of two-pronged riding crop that emitted an electrical shock when used. The jockey Arca Yroca used a red electrocrop while riding on the fathier Hoth Stuff on the Canto Bight racetrack on the planet Cantonica in 34 ABY. He applied the shock to the fathier's flank, causing the creature to speed up while letting out a cry of pain. That act of cruelty was witnessed by Resistance agents Rose Tico and Finn.

An electrocrop first appeared in the 2017 sequel trilogy film, Star Wars: Episode VIII The Last Jedi and was first identified in the accompanying reference book Star Wars: The Last Jedi: The Visual Dictionary, which was written by Pablo Hidalgo. The novelization of the film written by Jason Fry and the junior novel written by Michael Kogge both incorrectly described Yroca as using an electro-whip to strike his fathier rather than an electrocrop.
